title: WHAT I REALLY THINK ABOUT AHS: 1984
author: PossessedbyHorror
comment: the intro for AHS: 1984 has now been released and WHERE IS THE HORROR. why are they focusing so much on the 80's theme and only using horror tropes at least thus far? I'm very confused by this season but what do you guys think?
This is actually the one AHS theme that I've wanted since the beginning and was hoping they'd do a slasher season lol.
I would love you to do a video where you discuss each season of AHS and rank them.

The best part of AHS is that not everyone loves the same season! It’s just a great talking point. Like for me, I loved Roanoke but most people hated it. I hated cult but I’ve seen people in this comment section that loved it. That’s the beauty in an anthology series
Please do a ranking! I have not seen all of the seasons so would be really interested to know if I missed a really good one in your opinion 🙂
